attributes.action: listen to the public........we want the death sentence brought back for people like the scum that killed baby p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its about time, the powers that be listened to their public. we want the death sentence brought back and carried out against the evil people who commit crimes like the one against baby p. give the public the vote.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
